mapper.select: select objetno, userid, objettitle, objetintro, originmainposter, objetrfile1, objetrfile1, renamemainposter, objetstartdate, objetenddate, objettag, publicyn, objetregidate, objetstatus, objetview from objet where objetstatus = 'OPEN' and publicyn = 'Y' or objetstatus = 'STANDBY' order by objetstartdate desc

select max(c.objetno) objetno, max(c.objettitle) objettitle, max(c.objettitle2) objettitle2, max(c.objetintro) objetintro, a.userid, a.nickname nickname, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag, max(c.objetstatus) objetstatus, max(c.renamemainposter) renamemainposter, max(c.objettag) objettag, max(c.objetenddate) objetenddate, max(c.objetstartdate) objetstartdate, max(c.publicyn) publicyn, max(c.objetregidate) objetregidate, max(c.objetview) objetview, max(c.objetrfile1) objetrfile1, max(c.objetrfile2) objetrfile2 from users a join usersprofile b on a.userid = b.userid left outer join objet c on a.userid = c.userid where quityn = 'N' and blackyn = 'N' group by a.userid, a.nickname, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag
select * from objet where publicyn = 'Y'

select a.userid, a.nickname nickname, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag, max(c.objetstatus) objetstatus, max(c.renamemainposter) renamemainposter, max(c.objettag) objettag, max(c.objetenddate) objetenddate, max(c.objetstartdate) objetstartdate from users a join usersprofile b on a.userid = b.userid left outer join objet c on a.userid = c.userid where quityn = 'N' and blackyn = 'N' group by a.nickname, a.userid, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag order by objetenddate desc NULLS LAST

select a.userid, a.nickname nickname, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag, max(c.objetstatus) objetstatus, max(c.renamemainposter) renamemainposter, max(c.objettag) objettag, max(c.objetenddate) objetenddate, max(c.objetstartdate) objetstartdate from users a join usersprofile b on a.userid = b.userid left outer join objet c on a.userid = c.userid where quityn = 'N' and blackyn = 'N' group by a.nickname, a.userid, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag
objetenddate desc NULLS LAST nickname asc NULLS LAST

select * from (select * from objet join users using(userid) where publicyn = 'Y' and upper(objettitle) like '%' || upper(#{objettitle}) || '%' or upper(objetintro) like '%' || upper(#{objetintro}) || '%' or objettag like '%' || #{objettag} || '%' or objetcolor like '%' || #{objetcolor} || '%') where objetstatus = 'OPEN'

select * from (select a.userid userid, a.nickname nickname, b.userrpic userrpic, b.userintros userintros, b.userintrol userintrol, b.usertag usertag, max(c.objetstatus) objetstatus, max(c.objetenddate) objetenddate, max(c.objetstartdate) objetstartdate from users a join usersprofile b on a.userid = b.userid left outer join objet c on a.userid = c.userid where quityn = 'N' and blackyn = 'N' group by a.userid, a.nickname, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag) where userintrol like '%' || #{userintrol} || '%' or nickname like '%' || #{nickname} || '%' order by objetenddate desc NULLS LAST

select * from (select * from objet join users using(userid) where publicyn = 'Y' and upper(objettitle) like '%' || upper(#{keyword}) || '%' or upper(objetintro) like '%' || upper(#{keyword}) || '%' or objettag like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or objetcolor like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
objetstatus = 'STANDBY' objetstatus = 'OPEN' objetstatus = 'CLOSE'

select * from (select * from objet join users using(userid) where publicyn = 'Y'
and upper(objettitle) like '%' || upper(#{keyword}) || '%' or upper(objetintro) like '%' || upper(#{keyword}) || '%' or objettag like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or objetcolor like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
EXTRACT(YEAR FROM objetstartdate) = 2020 EXTRACT(YEAR FROM objetstartdate) = 2019 EXTRACT(YEAR FROM objetstartdate) = 2018

select * from (select a.userid userid, a.nickname nickname, b.userrpic userrpic, b.userintros userintros, b.userintrol userintrol, b.usertag usertag, max(c.objetstatus) objetstatus, max(c.objetenddate) objetenddate, max(c.objetstartdate) objetstartdate from users a join usersprofile b on a.userid = b.userid left outer join objet c on a.userid = c.userid where quityn = 'N' and blackyn = 'N' group by a.userid, a.nickname, b.userrpic, b.userintros, b.userintrol, b.usertag) where userintrol like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or nickname like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
objetenddate desc NULLS LAST nickname asc NULLS LAST
select nvl(objetstatus, 0) objetstatus from (select * from objet right outer join dual on userid = #{userid} order by objetstartdate desc) where rownum <= 1
select * from objet a join usersprofile b on a.userid = b.userid join users c on a.userid = c.userid where objetno = #{objetno}
select count(*) from visitedobjet where objetno = #{objetno} and userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from likeobjet where userid = #{userid} and objetno = #{objetno}
select * from likeobjet where objetno = #{objetno}
mapper.delete: delete from likeobjet where userid = #{userid} and objetno = #{objetno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from likeobjet where objetno = #{objetno}
select count(*) from review where objetno = #{objetno}
select count(*) from objet where userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from follower where To_user = #{To_user}
select count(*) from following where From_user = #{From_user}

select a.revuserid, a.objetno, a.revcontent, a.revstars, a.revdate, b.userrpic, c.nickname, count(d.revgood) revgood, count(d.revhate) revhate from review a join usersprofile b on a.revuserid = b.userid join users c on a.revuserid = c.userid join reviewstatus d on a.revuserid = d.revuserid where a.objetno = #{objetno} and d.objetno = #{objetno} and a.revuserid != #{revuserid} and d.revuserid != #{revuserid} group by a.revuserid, a.objetno, a.revcontent, a.revstars, a.revdate, b.userrpic, c.nickname order by a.revdate desc

select a.revuserid, a.objetno, a.revcontent, a.revstars, a.revdate, b.userrpic, c.nickname, count(d.revgood) revgood, count(d.revhate) revhate from review a join usersprofile b on a.revuserid = b.userid join users c on a.revuserid = c.userid join reviewstatus d on a.revuserid = d.revuserid where a.objetno = #{objetno} and d.objetno = #{objetno} and a.revuserid != #{userid} and d.revuserid != #{userid} group by a.revuserid, a.objetno, a.revcontent, a.revstars, a.revdate, b.userrpic, c.nickname
a.revdate desc a.revstars desc

select a.revuserid, a.objetno, a.revcontent, a.revstars, a.revdate, b.userrpic, c.nickname from review a join usersprofile b on a.revuserid = b.userid join users c on a.revuserid = c.userid where a.revuserid = #{userid} and a.objetno = #{objetno}
mapper.update: update review set revcontent = #{revcontent}, revstars = #{revstars}, revdate = sysdate where revuserid = #{revuserid} and objetno = #{objetno}
mapper.delete: delete from review where revuserid = #{revuserid} and objetno = #{objetno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reportboard where originno = #{originno} and reportedb = #{reportedb} and reporterb = #{reporterb}
select count(revgood) from reviewstatus where revuserid = #{revuserid} and userid = #{userid} and objetno = #{objetno}
select count(revhate) from reviewstatus where revuserid = #{revuserid} and userid = #{userid} and objetno = #{objetno}
mapper.delete: delete from reviewstatus where revuserid = #{revuserid} and objetno = #{objetno} and userid = #{userid}
delete from reviewstatus where revuserid = #{revuserid} and objetno = #{objetno} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select b.objettitle, b.objetstartdate, b.objetenddate, b.objetcolor from likeobjet a join objet b on a.objetno = b.objetno where a.userid = #{userid}
select a.visitdate, b.objettitle, b.objetcolor from visitedobjet a join objet b on a.objetno = b.objetno where a.userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from objet where userid = #{userid}

select count(*) from objet where userid = #{userid}
and publicyn = 'Y'
and publicyn = 'N'
and publicyn = 'W'
and objetstatus = 'OPEN'
and objetstatus = 'CLOSE'
and objetstatus = 'STANDBY'
and objetstatus = 'WAIT'
and objettitle like '%' || upper(#{objettitle}) || '%'

select * from (select rownum rnum, objetno, userid, objettitle, objetintro, renamemainposter, objetstartdate, objetenddate, objetstatus, publicyn, objettag, objetregidate from objet where userid = #{userid}
and publicyn = 'Y'
and publicyn = 'N'
and publicyn = 'W'
and objetstatus = 'OPEN'
and objetstatus = 'CLOSE'
and objetstatus = 'STANDBY'
and objetstatus = 'WAIT'
and objettitle like '%' || upper(#{objettitle}) || '%'
order by objetno desc) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

insert into objet values (OBJETNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{objettitle}, #{objetintro}, #{originmainposter}, #{renamemainposter}, #{objetstartdate}, #{objetenddate}, #{objettag}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{objettitle1}, #{objetintro1}, #{objetofile1}, #{objetrfile1}, #{objettitle2}, #{objetintro2}, #{objetofile2}, #{objetrfile2}, #{objettitle3}, #{objetintro3}, #{objetofile3}, #{objetrfile3}, #{objettitle4}, #{objetintro4}, #{objetofile4}, #{objetrfile4}, #{objettitle5}, #{objetintro5}, #{objetofile5}, #{objetrfile5}, #{objettitle6}, #{objetintro6}, #{objetofile6}, #{objetrfile6}, #{objettitle7}, #{objetintro7}, #{objetofile7}, #{objetrfile7}, #{objettitle8}, #{objetintro8}, #{objetofile8}, #{objetrfile8}, #{objetcolor})
select count(*) from likeobjet where objetno = #{objetno}
select count(*) from review where objetno = #{objetno}
select * from objet where userid = #{userid}
select * from objet where objetno = #{objetno}
select count(*) from visitedobjet where userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from likeobjet where userid = #{userid}
